original_title: Sesame Street: Elmo's World: People in Your Neighborhood
overview: Who are the people in Elmo's Neighborhood? In this fun release, Elmo finds out all about some of the important people who work in our communities. "Helping" jobs such as doctors, firefighters, lifeguards and nurses are highlighted in 3 full Elmo's World shows; Elmo's World Firefighters, Elmo's World Doctors, and Elmo's World Helping.
title: Sesame Street: Elmo's World: People in Your Neighborhood
